newsitem.title: USA: Pete's Brewing adopts shareholders rights.
newsitem.headline: Pete's Brewing adopts shareholders rights.

text.p: Pete's Brewing Co said on Wednesday that it has adopted a shareholders rights plan to guard against attempts to gain control of Pete's without paying all shareholders fair value.

Pete's declared a dividend distribution of one preferred share purchase right on each outstanding share of common stock. Each right entitles shareholders to buy one share of the series A participating preferred Stock at an exercise price of $65. The dividend distribution will be payable to shareholders of record on January 5, 1997.
The rights are exercisable 10 days after an attempt to acquire 15 percent or more of the company's common stock.
